articles.author: Nette Nöstlinger
articles.title: Trump team clashes with Berlin over AfD designation as right-wing extremist - politico.eu
articles.description: The heavy criticism from top American officials comes days before a new coalition government is set to take power in Berlin.
articles.content:
“The West tore down the Berlin Wall together. And it has been rebuilt not by the Soviets or the Russians, but by the German establishment,” Vance said in his post.
